mapper.select: SELECT a.title ,b.board_file_no ,b.file_name FROM brd_ref_report a, brd_ref_report_file b WHERE a.board_no = b.board_no AND a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY b.board_file_no

SELECT board_no ,user_no ,getTopMbrBscUserName(user_no) user_nm ,category_id ,getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'cate_code', category_id) category_id_nm ,event_id ,getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'event_code', event_id) event_id_nm ,type_id ,getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'type_code', type_id) type_id_nm ,title ,contents ,reg_ip ,reg_date ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') reg_date_fmt ,view_cnt FROM brd_ref_report WHERE board_no = #{board_no}

SELECT board_file_no ,board_no ,file_path ,file_name ,reg_date ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt ,CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_ref_report_file WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_file_no
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_ref_report SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
